name: RTCPeerConnection.onsignalingstatechange
description: The onsignalingstatechange event handler property of the RTCPeerConnection interface specifies a function to be called when the signalingstatechange event occurs on an RTCPeerConnection interface.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
